summary:
Staring unflinchingly into the abyss of slavery, this novel transforms
history into a story as powerful as Exodus and as intimate as a
lullaby.

A fatal mid-air collision involving a commercial airliner prompts a

thriller exploring the issue of safety and security in the aircraft
industry

Five American expatriates living in Budapest in the early 1990s seek
to establish themselves and make their fortunes in a city still
haunted by the tragedies of its Communist past.

thriller, which is chock-full of signs, portents, angels, and one
somewhat second-rate devil, a murky and undercharacterized guy named

After a violent encounter with a homeless man, talented corporate
lawyer Michael finds himself out in the streets, lucky to be alive,
and holding a top-secret file belonging to his former employers

You were so promising at the beginning: Sexy, smart, personable and
funny. Great on dates and really great afterward-if you know what I
mean. But this is a sad state of affairs; or, in your case, non-
affairs!
A collection of advice on how to live a happy and rewarding life.

When rape and murder strike young, single women on the sun-drenched
San Diego coast, police are stumped.

" The hero-narrator of The Catcher in the Rye is an ancient child
of sixteen, a native New Yorker named Holden Caufield.

Placed in the federal witness protection program after seeing a
murder, Manhattan real-estate agent Lacey Farrell nevertheless must

The starship Enterprise rescues Captain Montgomery Scott, who has been

This enchanting work of fantasy leads readers on a stirring quest
through enchanted lands with the hapless but good-hearted King Quad.

After Earth is demolished to make way for a new hyperspatial

Two orphan sisters in the late 1800s leave New York on the orphan

Two sixteen-year-old girls from different social classes spend the

Heather returns from her missionary trip to Africa, dissapointed to
find her selfish family unchanged, and a second trip back, with the
whole family this time, might be just what everyone needs. Original.

Not since Jurassic Park has a novel so enthralled readers everywhere.
Now, enter the world of Neanderthal... The expedition of the
century...uncovers the find of the millennium...Neanderthal.

In a desperate bid for some quick cash, a married couple stages the
fall of their daughter down a well, with terrifying consequences that

The author, a new father, discusses the intricacies of welcoming a new

Contains tales of enchantment, wonder, and horror by authors including
Ursula K. LeGuin, Charles de Lint, Tanith Lee, Gene Wolfe, Ted Chiang,

. . After a day spent staring at a computer monitor, think of the book

Three teenage siblings find themselves embroiled in spiritual warfare

Waiting is even better, rich with character, suspense and constant

The Nanny Diaries deftly skewers the manner in which America's

A remarkable debut novel and bittersweet tale of the unflinching love

The Bell Jar chronicles the crack-up of Esther Greenwood: brilliant,

--maybe for the last time.

When Stella Marz, Assistant County Prosecutor and head of the homicide

When we first meet him, Chappie is a punked-out teenager living with

Can Arthur save the Earth from total multidimensional obliteration?
Can he save the Guide from a hostile alien takeover? Can he save his

Before the dawn of history, a brave people found a new world, led by a

But as the trial unfolds, it is Paget who will be surprised...by

lying...by a woman prosecutor who believes Mary invented the story of

Caught in a dead-end, low-paying job as an editorial assistant in New

As the only person in Xanth without magic of any sort, Bink wanders in

A memoir of the scientific wonder of youth by the distinguished

When the armies of Heaven and Hell decide it's time for

Told in Dinah's voice, this novel reveals the traditions and

Deborah Cochrane and Joanna Meissner, close friends and fellow grad

Follows an 84-year-old pathologist across the country with

Original.

Two stories, "Kitchen" and "Moonlight Shadow,"
told through the eyes of a pair of contemporary young Japanese women,

This edition contains substantial excerpts from the original four-act
version which was never produed, as well as the full test of the final

Including twenty-two photographs and more than fifty drawings of these

Billy's friends are sore that Billy ate all the worms and won the

With Bean's help, he will eventually rule the world. Shadow of the

Internationally chaos looms on the horizon as a group of hardline

A fable about undauntingly following one's dreams, listening to

A timeless fable about a man whose humble life and plainspoken wisdom

Not least if you're a dog. Just imagine: 108,627 fire hydrants.

David Baldacci has always delivered great stories, authentic

When he discovers the litterer is one of the most powerful political

When Dr Sam Laschen, expert in post-traumatic stress, agrees to

FBI Special Agent Dillon Savich teams up with new agent Lacey Sherlock

New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum returns in her fifth adventure

Boston private detective Spenser and his cohorts head west to Potshot,

This thriller series is especially designed to appeal to middle-grade
